text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem name-assembly-order

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/name-assembly-order defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
NL1 Own Name
NL2 Partner Name
NL3 Partner Name followed by Maiden Name
NL4 Own Name followed by Partner Name

name: HumanNameAssemblyOrder
title: HumanNameAssemblyOrder
description: A code that represents the preferred display order of the components of a human name.

concept.display: Partner Name followed by Maiden Name
Own Name followed by Partner Name
